title: Japan Fire Leaves 27 Feared Dead in Osaka
sub_head: Fourth floor of building in densely populated area is affected
body:
TOKYO—Twenty-seven people are feared dead after a fire Friday morning in a building in Osaka, Japan, public broadcaster NHK said.
The fire on the building’s fourth floor was put out after about 30 minutes and television footage didn’t show significant external damage to the building, but 27 people inside were feared dead, NHK said.
